entry.title: World's simplest database migration utility
entry.summary: A simple SQLite migration script written in Python
entry.content:
I had to write a migration for a SQLite database the other day, and decided to do some yak-shaving and write the world's simplest db migration utility. It only migrates one direction, and you have to write migration scripts by hand. But it seems to work, so here it is.

import os

The PRAGMA stuff could be replaced by a table that keeps track of what the version, or has a list of the scripts applied. For now, user_version is going to work fine.
